channel.title: Client that works with DS source
channel.description: I need a client that will work with DeltaScape's server source. All the ones I have tried just disconnect me. I have tried DeltaScape Client v4, v11, and PKJAD Scape's client. Please post a download link for a client that will work, or if you believe one of those versions I have tried should work I will retry and post results. I may also be doing something wrong. Another thing is that I'm connecting to localhost or 127.0.0.1. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Client that works with DS source
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Where? I tried v4 and v11 and they didn’t work. What happens is I log in and it logs in and everything. The only thing is that the screen stays black for say 20-30 secs. And then it kicks me off. When I try logging in under the same account it says This account is already logged in. Please try again in 60 seconds.

Read full topic
item.source: Client that works with DS source
